function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Occupant exposure in confined spaces","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implementing ventilation systems, reducing occupancy, promoting mask usage","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air purifiers, occupancy tracking systems","People":"Occupants, visitors, staff","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, public health authorities"}]}
